name: Element.on
desc: Attaches an event handler to an Element.

variants.desc: Attaches the callback function to the element for the named event.

param.name: name
param.desc: The name of the event to attach (e.g.: 'click', 'submit', etc.)

param.name: callback
param.desc: The function to call when the event occurs.

name: Element.once
desc: Attaches an event handler to an Element that will be called at most one time.

variants.desc: Attaches the callback function to the element for the named event.

param.name: name
param.desc: The name of the event to attach (e.g.: 'click', 'submit', etc.)

param.name: callback
param.desc: The function to call when the event occurs.

name: Element.click
desc: Attaches a handler for the 'click' event to an Element.

variants.desc: Attaches the callback function to the element for the named event.

param.name: callback
param.desc: The function to call when the click event occurs.

name: Element.off
desc: Removes an event handler from an Element.

variants.desc: Removes the callback function from the element for the named event.

param.name: name
param.desc: The name of the event to remove from (e.g.: 'click', 'submit', etc.)
